official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to permit the use of assistance under the community development block grant program for uniform emergency telephone number systems.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to permit community development block grants to be used for uniform emergency telephone number systems.
